[Portrait]Confessor Zalmour
[Dialog]The Blackram Knights' Delita Heiral?
Yours is an unexpected sight!{END}

[Portrait]Delita
[Dialog]He has seen me. He must not live to tell
of it!
We must fight them, <Ramza>!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]They know nothing of the High Confessor's
plot. They serve him blindly.
If we explain what has happened, they may well
listen.{END}

Hear your words, <Ramza>!
Reasoning with their ilk is folly,
even you must see this.
But you have leave to try!{END}

[Portrait]Confessor Zalmour
[Dialog]You realize what it is you do?

This man is a heretic! You that do abet
him shall share his fate!

I did not think to find the commander of
the Blackram Knights a traitor to our
cause!{END}

[Portrait]Delita
[Dialog]My choice is made. If it means I must slay
each of you to the man, so be it!{END}

You should tremble with fear to mock the
Heavens so!

To slay a man of the cloth is to wound this fair
land's peace, and turn your back on the natural
order the Father has bestowed on us!
It is to turn your back on the gods!{END}

Wound the peace? Ha!


You hide behind this peace only as it suits you!


You invoke the name of the gods to subjugate
the weak. This peace you hail is a vile farce!

Men such as you profane the gods to speak
their names!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]It is not the gods that concern me,
but the truth!{END}

[Portrait]Confessor Zalmour
[Dialog]Truth, you say? Do you name the charges
against you false?
Our Holy Office offered you a forum in which
to clear your name, to absolve yourself of the
charges of murder and theft that dog you.
But you discarded this chance like so much
night soil. You fled, and in so running proved
your guilt!
You have been tried and found guilty,
<Ramza> Beoulve!

Your only absolution now is in death!
The hour of your plea comes too late!{END}

Then you force my hand!{END}

[Portrait]Confessor Zalmour
[Dialog]Great Father, strike these sinners, that they...
may feel your wrath...{END}
